de.iabg.mesh
Class RigidMeshConnectionModel

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.mesh.DefaultMeshConnectionModel
      de.iabg.mesh.RigidMeshConnectionModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, MeshConnectionModel, Loggable
public class RigidMeshConnectionModel
extends DefaultMeshConnectionModel

This implementation of MeshConnectionModel extends a DefaultMeshConnectionModel to create a rigid connection.

Version:
November 1, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
